item.description:
This release expands focus rewards and the tree overlay experience.

  • Continuous focus rewards with tree progress tracking.
  • Daily rewards persistence with goal setting and progress scaled to the daily goal.
  • Timed tree overlay with a hotkey to show it on demand.
  • Tree spark counters, focus spark award tracking, and a force-points control.
  • Updated defaults and overlay logic for daily-only point displays.
